pageTitle: Clearance Sapient Yeti Snowboard for Sale - Boys
textBeforeTable: 1 Year Warranty Hybrid flat/ rockered camber story Cucumber Camber Cap Construction Extruded base Fullwrap Metal Edge Wood Core Directional Twin Key Features of the Sapient Yeti Snowboard: Jump on the Sapient Yeti Snowboard and show sasquatches they aren't king of the mountain when you're around. This fast, all-mountain freestyle board will have their jaws dropping in awe when they see what it lets you do. Inside, the board features a poplar wooden core with biax fiberglass, with on the outside it features cap construction and a metal edge wrapping the whole thing. With its twin-directional, all terrain shape, the Sapient Yeti will prove abominable snowmen aren't the only beasts on the mountain. Product Features
textAfterTable: All Gear by: Sapient FEATURED BRANDS
